spell.name: Dimensional Sheath
entries: You can spend a short rest performing a ritual on an object that weighs 10 lbs or less, placing it in a small pocket dimension. Once you do so, you can use a bonus action to retrieve or stow directly to or from your hand. If the object is a weapon, you can stow or draw it as part of your free item interaction instead. The spell ends if you are reduced to 0 hit points or cast this spell again. If the spell ends with the object in the pocket dimension it falls to the ground next to you.

components.m: an object weighing 10 lbs or less

spell.name: Blink Feint
entries: You teleport yourself past an enemy's defenses, striking from an unexpected direction. Teleport 10 feet into an unoccupied location, you have advantage on your next attack before the end your turn.

spell.name: Rune of Cutting
entries: You place a magical rune on a weapon, sharpening its edge. While you hit a creature with this weapon, it takes {@dice 1d4} extra slashing damage. When you take damage, you automatically succeed on the concentration check to sustain this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The damage increases to {@dice 1d6} at spell level 2, {@dice 1d8} at spell level 3, {@dice 1d10} at spell level 4, {@dice 1d12} at spell level 5, {@dice 2d6} at spell level 6, {@dice 2d8} at spell level 7, {@dice 2d10} at spell level 8, and {@dice 2d12} at spell level 9.

components.m: a slashing melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

spell.name: Rune of Force
entries: You place a magical rune on a weapon, increasing its impact. When you hit someone with the weapon, you push the creature up to 5 feet. When you take damage, you automatically succeed on the concentration check to sustain this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Increase the distance pushed by 5 feet for each spell level after the first.

components.m: a bludgeoning melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

spell.name: Rune of Puncturing
entries: You place a magical rune on a weapon, increasing its point. While wielding the weapon, you can score a critical hit on a 19 or 20. When you take damage, you automatically succeed on the concentration check to sustain this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Increase the critical hit range by 1 for each spell level after the first. So casting this as a 4th level spell will allow critical hits between 16 and 20.

components.m: a piercing melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

spell.name: Teleport Slash
entries: You teleport around the battlefield in slashing different enemies in quick succession. Teleport up to a number of feet equal to 5 times your casting modifier and make a single melee attack. Then teleport a second time and make another attack against a different target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For each spell slot level beyond 2nd you can teleport and attack one additional time, but each attack must be against a different target.

spell.name: Floating Weapon
entries: Your weapon floats near you, mimicking your movements as if you were still holding it. Your reach is effectively increased by 5 feet and you cannot be disarmed. In addition, any spells that requires a weapon also has its range also increased by 5 feet if you choose the same weapon. If you release your grip the spell ends. When you take damage, you automatically succeed on the concentration check to sustain this spell.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Increase the range by 5 feet for each level spell level beyond 2nd.

spell.name: Multiple Locality Strike
entries: You momentarily exist in multiple places, just long enough to attack everyone around you. Select an unoccupied space beside each creature you choose within 30 feet. You appear in all those spaces simultaneously and make a single melee attack against them. Treating each attack roll as if you had rolled a 15 on the d20 and add your casting modifier to the damage rolls. You can then choose one of those spaces, or your starting space, and only exist in that place. Any effect that would apply to you, such as if you appeared in a cloud of daggers or hit someone with flame shield, does not take effect until you return to one spot.

components.m: a one handed melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Increase the range by 10 feet for each level spell level beyond 3rd.

spell.name: Aspect of Marilith
entries: You temporarily grow 2 extra arms that can each wield a one handed weapon. The arms can draw a sheathed weapon as part of the casting, or can deal {@dice 1d6} slashing damage with an unarmed strike. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action to have each of your arms make a single melee attack. In addition, the extra arms each gain a special extra reaction that can only be used to parry a melee attack that would hit you or to make an opportunity attack. Parrying adds +3 to AC against the triggering attack, potentially causing it to miss.

components.m: a one handed melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At spell level 7 you grow 3 extra arms. At spell level 9 you grow 4 extra arms.

spell.name: Thousand Blade Strike
entries: You create a small time bubble that surrounds you and allows you to attack assault a target relentlessly. Onlookers see nothing but a blur of movement and uncountable strikes against the target. Make 20 melee attacks against a creature within range, treating the first attack roll as if you had rolled a 1 on the d20, the second as if you had rolled a 2, the third as if you had rolled a 3, and so on with up to 20. The target is partially caught in the time bubble leaving it able to defend itself, but it gains no extra actions or turns.

components.m: a one handed melee weapon worth at least 1 gold piece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At spell level 7 you grow 3 extra arms. At spell level 9 you grow 4 extra arms.
